entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning with a few flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
